info.title: M&M Car Rental Backend API Documentation
info.description: This is an API documentation for M&M Car Rental Backend API. You can find all the endpoints and their descriptions here.

post.description: Digunakan untuk login ke dalam aplikasi

get.description: This endpoint retrieves the current user who is logged in to the application based on the provided Bearer token. It returns user details such as ID, email, and role, or an error message if the user is not authenticated or the token is invalid/expired.
Retrieve all cars from the database. If no cars are found, a 204 No Content response will be returned. If data is found, a 200 OK response with the car data is returned.
Retrieve a car by its ID. If no car is found with the provided ID, a 404 Not Found response will be returned. If the car is found, a 200 OK response with the car data is returned.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the car to retrieve

message.description: Message indicating no data was found

post.description: This endpoint allows an admin to add a new car to the system. It requires authentication and the user must have an admin role.

message.example: Access denied: Only admins can add cars

patch.description: This endpoint allows an admin to update the details of a car by its ID. It requires authentication and the user must have an admin role.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the car to update (UUID format)

400.description: Validation Failed or Invalid ID format

message.example: Invalid ID format or Validation Failed

data.description: Validation errors or ID format error

message.example: Access denied: Only admins can update cars
There is no car with this ID

get.description: This endpoint allows users to retrieve cars that belong to a specific category by providing the category ID.

parameters.name: id_kategori
parameters.description: ID of the car category (integer, references 'jenis_mobil' table)

200.description: List of cars in the specified category

data.description: Validation errors for the category ID

404.description: No cars found in this category

message.example: There is no car in this category

data.description: No cars in the specified category

message.example: Failed to fetch cars by category

get.description: This endpoint allows users to retrieve cars that are assigned a specific status ID.

parameters.name: status_id
parameters.description: ID of the car status (integer, references 'status' table)

200.description: List of cars with the specified status

data.description: Validation errors for the status ID

404.description: No cars found with the specified status

message.example: Currently there is no car with this status

data.description: No cars with the specified status

message.example: Failed to fetch cars by status

delete.description: This endpoint allows an admin to delete a car using its ID. Only admins can access this endpoint.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the car to be deleted (UUID format)

message.example: There is no car with this ID

403.description: Forbidden - Only admins can access this endpoint

message.example: Unauthorized access, only admins can delete cars

get.description: This endpoint is used to get all vehicle categories that are available in the database.

message.example: An error occurred while fetching vehicle types.

post.description: This endpoint registers a new user by accepting the user's name, email, password, phone number, and address. The system will create a new user record in the database with a default role of 2 (User).
This endpoint creates a new reservation for a car to be rented by the user

car_id.description: UUID of the car to be reserved

get.description: This endpoint retrieves all reservations history made by current logged-in user

404.description: No reservation found for the user

message.example: No reservation found related to this user

get.description: This endpoint retrieves all reservations made by users. This endpoint is only accessible by Admin

patch.description: This endpoint is used to update user profile, like username, phone number, address, and email

400.description: Invalid data provided or no data provided to update

additionalProperties.example: The email field must be a valid email.

404.description: No user found with that ID

message.example: No user found with that ID

bearerAuth.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme.
bearerAuth.name: Authorization
